job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: This individual will work to monitor system health investigate and troubleshoot delivery failures andor related production issues escalate issues as needed and take part in an oncall rotation roughly every 56 weeks The main focus of this role will be to monitor batch and realtime processing and support overall production support activity as well as aid in the automation of manual tasksbrbr 35 years of operations experience with largescale highavailability distributed systemsbr ApplicationPlatform production support experiencebr SQLOracle and UNIX functional proficiencybr An understanding of programming  java javascript web development etcbr Oncall support experience with a critical platformbr Familiarity with BatchScheduled job execution and troubleshootingbr File Transfer Protocol FTP experiencebr Scripting and automation experiencebr Healthcare EDIANSIX12 industry knowledgebr Splunk New Relic Solar Winds or other enterprise monitoring tool experience
